post.summary: Gets a members direct message by the message Id.
Gets a members direct messages by given channel type, limited by page size (default 10).

parameters.name: channelType
parameters.description: Channel type. Values: push, email, sms. Default is all.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of messages to retrieve. Default is 10.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort direction for items. Default is ascending, Values: ascending|descending

post.summary: Submits a poll result
post.description:
Must include either 'pollresults' or 'fieldItems' array in the request body. FieldItems with fieldItemId included is preferred, 
and if fieldItems is included, pollresults will be ignored. If multiple languages are supported, must supply fieldItems.
FieldItems can be obtained through '/api_ext/v1/Poll/Results' or '/api_ext/v1/Person/{sourceId}/Messages/{adtype}' endpoints.

CreatePersonRequest.description: Creates a person record using the API

systemName.description: The system name of the message

title.description: The title/subject heading of the message

lastPublishedDate.description: The date of submission to broadcast engine

startDate.description: The scheduled start date of the message if set, otherwise the date of submission to the broadcast engine

channel.description: The channel used for the direct message

interstitialImage.description: The interstitial image or gif. Will be blank if using a video

interstitialVideoLink.description: The interstitial video link. Will be blank if not using a video

url.description: The url / deep link of the message

campaignName.description: The campaign name for the message

campaignCategoryName.description: The campaign category name for the message

DirectMessageItem.description: API Contract to For Direct Messages

link.description: Person Link for API data retrieval

Bearer Tracking Token.description: Obtained from using Basic Authentication on endpoint: /api_ext/v1/Person/get-tracking-token

Basic Authentication.description: Obtained from application instance Account Details / Integrations section
